subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Though Darnell Nurse’s family gravitated to football and basketball, he was encouraged to play hockey because his parents thought it was safer than football. Now, he is expected to be selected in the first round of the N.H.L. draft.
snippet: Though Darnell Nurse’s family gravitated to football and basketball, he was encouraged to play hockey because his parents thought it was safer than football. Now, he is expected to be selected in the first round of the N.H.L. draft.
